projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.desc: A personal portfolio website built with Next.js and TailwindCSS to showcase my projects, qualifications, and skills. Features a modern design with smooth animations and responsive layout.

projects.title: Spotify Profile Stats & Dashboard
projects.desc: A Spotify profile stats and dashboard built with Next.js and TailwindCSS. It allows you to see your Spotify profile stats and dashboard.

projects.title: Wordle Clone
projects.desc: A Wordle clone built with React. It allows you to play the game and see your stats.

projects.title: Streamix
projects.desc: A movie streaming platform built with Next.js and TailwindCSS. It allows you to stream movies and TV shows

projects.title: Multiplayer Pong Game
projects.desc: A multiplayer pong game built with React and Socket.io. It allows you to play the game, chat, and see your stats with your friends.

projects.title: System Administration Project
projects.desc: A containerized web infrastructure project featuring WordPress, NGINX, and MariaDB. Built with Docker for seamless deployment, featuring TLS encryption, automated container orchestration, and persistent data storage.
